00042 CReadWindow* CDisplayWindow::createReadInstance(ListCSwordModuleInfo modules, CMDIArea* parent, const char* name = 0) {
00043   switch (modules.first()->type()) {
00044         case CSwordModuleInfo::Bible:
00045             return new CBibleReadWindow(modules, parent);
00046         case CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary:
00047             return new CCommentaryReadWindow(modules, parent);
00048         case CSwordModuleInfo::Lexicon:
00049             return new CLexiconReadWindow(modules, parent);
00050         case CSwordModuleInfo::GenericBook:         
00051             return new CBookReadWindow(modules, parent);
00052         default:
00053             qWarning("unknown module type");
00054             break;
00055     }
00056   return 0;
00057 }

00085 const QString CDisplayWindow::windowCaption(){
00086 //  qWarning("CDisplayWindow::windowCaption()");
00087     if (!m_modules.count())
00088         return QString::null;
00089 
00090     QString ret = m_modules.first()->name();        
00091     if (m_modules.count() > 1) {
00092         for (m_modules.next(); m_modules.current(); m_modules.next())    {
00093             ret += " | " + m_modules.current()->name(); 
00094         }
00095     }
00096     return ret;
00097 }

00102 //  qWarning("count is %i", m_modules.count());
00103     return m_modules;
00104 }

00189 void CDisplayWindow::modulesChanged(){
00190   setModules( m_moduleChooserBar->getModuleList() );
00191   if (!modules().count())
00192     close();
00193   else {
00194         if (displaySettingsButton())
00195         displaySettingsButton()->reset(modules());
00196       key()->module(modules().first());
00197       keyChooser()->setModules(modules());  
00198       lookup(key());
00199     }
00200 }
00201 
00203 void CDisplayWindow::lookup( CSwordKey* key ){
00204 }

00212 void CDisplayWindow::setModuleChooserBar( CModuleChooserBar* bar ){
00213     if (m_moduleChooserBar)
00214         disconnect(m_moduleChooserBar, SIGNAL(sigChanged()), this, SLOT(modulesChanged()));
00215     m_moduleChooserBar = bar;
00216     connect(bar, SIGNAL(sigChanged()), SLOT(modulesChanged()));
00217 }

00222 }

00225 const bool CDisplayWindow::init( const QString& keyName ){
00226   initView();
00227   setMinimumSize( 350,300 );    
00228   setCaption(windowCaption());
00229   show();
00230     initConnections();
00231   initKeyboardActions();
00232 
00233   m_filterOptions = CBTConfig::getFilterOptionDefaults();
00234     m_displayOptions = CBTConfig::getDisplayOptionDefaults();
00235     if (displaySettingsButton())
00236         displaySettingsButton()->reset(modules());
00237 
00238   key()->key(keyName);
00239 
00240   return true;
00241 }

00259 void CDisplayWindow::setDisplaySettingsButton( CDisplaySettingsButton* button ){
00260   if (m_displaySettingsButton)
00261         disconnect(m_displaySettingsButton, SIGNAL( sigChanged() ),this,    SLOT(lookup() ));
00262   m_displaySettingsButton = button; 
00263     connect(m_displaySettingsButton, SIGNAL(sigChanged()),this, SLOT(lookup()));
00264 }
00265 
00267 void CDisplayWindow::lookup(){
00268 //  qWarning("CDisplayWindow::lookup()");
00269     lookup( key() );
00270 }
00271 
00272 void CDisplayWindow::lookup( const QString& moduleName, const QString& keyName ) {
00273 //  qWarning("CDisplayWindow::lookup( const QString&, const QString& )");
00274 //  Q_ASSERT(isReady());
00275   if (!isReady())
00276     return;
00277 
00278 
00279     CSwordModuleInfo* m = backend()->findModuleByName(moduleName);
00280   if (!m)
00281     return;
00282 
00283     if (m && modules().containsRef(m) && !keyName.isEmpty()) {
00284         key()->key(keyName);
00285         keyChooser()->setKey(key()); //the key chooser does send an update signal
00286     }
00287     else {
00288         QWidgetList windows = mdi()->windowList();
00289     bool found = false;
00290         CDisplayWindow* dw = 0;
00291     for (windows.first(); windows.current(); windows.next()) {
00292         dw = dynamic_cast<CDisplayWindow*>(windows.current());
00293         if (dw && dw->modules().containsRef(m)) {
00294                 found = true;
00295                 break;
00296             }
00297         }
00298         if (found) {
00299             dw->lookup(moduleName, keyName);
00300     }
00301         else {
00302         ListCSwordModuleInfo mList;
00303         mList.append(m);
00304             mdi()->emitCreateDisplayWindow(mList, keyName);
00305     }
00306     }   
00307 }
00308 
00309 void CDisplayWindow::lookup( const QString& key ) {
00310 //  qWarning("CDisplayWindow::lookup( const QString& key )");
00311     lookup(modules().first()->name(), key);
00312 }
